metadata.title: rapidjson: pivilege escalation via integer overflow in GenericReader::ParseNumber() (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: The MITRE CVE dictionary describes this issue as: Tencent RapidJSON is vulnerable to privilege escalation due to an integer overflow in the `GenericReader::ParseNumber()` function of `include/rapidjson/reader.h` when parsing JSON text from a stream. An attacker needs to send the victim a crafted file which needs to be opened; this triggers the integer overflow vulnerability (when the file is parsed), leading to elevation of privilege.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
leatherman is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
